Download the data following instructions in:
https://crcns.org/data-sets/methods/spe-2/about-spe-2
(you will need to create an account with CRCNS.org first)

Code:
https://github.com/georgedimitriadis/themeaningofbrain/blob/master/ExperimentSpecificCode/_2015_Paired_Recordings_JN/Joana_Neto/
(look at files paired_32ch.py and paired_128ch.py
